document_data.caption: A map of Tu Pe showing the location of the Vix Festival Hall.
document_data.name: The Vix Festival Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''The Vix Festival Hall''' was a hall for the hosting of festivals in the city of [[Tu Pe]] in [[Koryo]] around [[1357 DR]]. It stood in the northern end of the city, close to [[Bokuri Nesra]]'s potter's yard.
